item.title: CVE-2021-44779|2024-08-04T04:32:12.982Z -- g.j.p. -- %5Bgwa%5D%20autoresponder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL Injection (SQLi) vulnerability discovered in [GWA] AutoResponder WordPress plugin (versions <= 2.3), vulnerable at (&listid). No patched version available, plugin closed.
